statements: SELECT * FROM PopulationTracking ORDER BY year DESC, population_size ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, year, population_size FROM PopulationTracking WHERE population_size > 5000
SELECT * FROM PopulationTracking WHERE year = 2020
SELECT id, genetic_diversity FROM PopulationTracking WHERE genetic_diversity < 0.5
SELECT year, AVG(population_size) AS avg_population FROM PopulationTracking GROUP BY year
SELECT * FROM PopulationTracking WHERE year > 2000 ORDER BY population_size DESC
SELECT id, year, population_size FROM PopulationTracking WHERE genetic_diversity < 0.5
SELECT year, population_size, genetic_diversity FROM PopulationTracking WHERE population_size BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT id, year, genetic_diversity FROM PopulationTracking WHERE population_size >= 500 ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT id, year, population_size, genetic_diversity FROM PopulationTracking WHERE year = 2010
SELECT year, population_size, genetic_diversity FROM population_dynamics WHERE year > 2000
SELECT * FROM genetic_changes WHERE year = 2010
SELECT population_size, year, genetic_diversity FROM population_dynamics WHERE genetic_diversity > 0.5
SELECT * FROM population_dynamics WHERE year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000
SELECT year, genetic_variation FROM genetic_changes WHERE mutation_rate > 0.1
SELECT * FROM population_dynamics WHERE year > 2000 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT year, population_size FROM population_dynamics WHERE genetic_diversity > 0.5;
SELECT genetic_variation FROM genetic_changes WHERE mutation_rate < 0.001 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT year, population_size, genetic_diversity FROM population_dynamics WHERE year BETWEEN 2005 AND 2010;
SELECT * FROM population_dynamics JOIN genetic_changes ON population_dynamics.year = genetic_changes.year WHERE population_size > 1000 AND mutation_rate < 0.005
SELECT * FROM population_dynamics ORDER BY sampling_date DESC
SELECT population_id, location, population_size FROM population_dynamics WHERE population_size > 1000
SELECT location, population_size FROM population_dynamics WHERE location = 'City A'
SELECT sample_id, genetic_marker, allele_frequency FROM genetic_diversity WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5
SELECT * FROM time_tracking ORDER BY tracking_date ASC
SELECT * FROM population_dynamics WHERE location='New York'
SELECT population_id, location FROM population_dynamics WHERE population_size > 10000 ORDER BY population_size DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM population_dynamics
SELECT * FROM genetic_diversity WHERE allele_frequency BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5
SELECT * FROM time_tracking WHERE tracking_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Population;
SELECT location, population_size FROM Population ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT population_id, location, year FROM Population WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT pool_id, allele, frequency FROM GeneticPool WHERE generation = 5;
SELECT from_location, to_location, migration_rate FROM Migration ORDER BY migration_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Population WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Population WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT population_id, location, population_size, year FROM Population WHERE location LIKE 'A%' AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM GeneticEvent WHERE event_type = 'Mutation' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT pool_id, allele, frequency, generation FROM GeneticPool WHERE generation < 5 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticDiversity
SELECT population_id, genetic_trait FROM GeneticDiversity
SELECT diversity_id, trait_variation FROM GeneticDiversity
SELECT * FROM GeneticDiversity WHERE trait_variation > 0.5
SELECT population_id, genetic_trait FROM GeneticDiversity WHERE trait_variation < 0.3
SELECT * FROM GeneticDiversity WHERE genetic_trait = 'Mutation' ORDER BY trait_variation DESC;
SELECT diversity_id, population_id, genetic_trait FROM GeneticDiversity WHERE trait_variation > 0.5 AND genetic_trait LIKE '%allele%' ORDER BY diversity_id;
SELECT DISTINCT population_id FROM GeneticDiversity WHERE trait_variation BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;
SELECT population_id, COUNT(diversity_id) AS trait_count FROM GeneticDiversity GROUP BY population_id HAVING COUNT(diversity_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM GeneticDiversity WHERE population_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT population_id FROM GeneticDiversity WHERE trait_variation < 0.3) ORDER BY population_id ASC, trait_variation DESC;
